SEARCH
Module com.example.thenotelobster
Package com.example.thenotelobster.model.NoteClasses

Class NotePageDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.thenotelobster.model.NoteClasses.NotePageDAO
public class NotePageDAO extends Object
The Data Access Object is used for handling the CRUD operations on folders and notes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a NotePageDAo and creates a database connection

  • Constructor Details

    • NotePageDAO

      public NotePageDAO()
      Creates a NotePageDAo and creates a database connection

  • Method Details

    • insertFolder

      public int insertFolder(String folderName, String userEmail)
      Inserts a new folder into the database for the user
      Parameters:
      folderName - name of the newly created folder
      userEmail - email identifying the folder's owner
      Returns:
      will generate a folderId on success or -1 if the insertion has failed

    • getFolderId

      public int getFolderId(String folderName, String userEmail)
      Retrieves the ID of a folder by its name and owner.
      Parameters:
      folderName - name of the folder
      userEmail - email identifying the owner of the folder
      Returns:
      returns folderId if found or -1 if not found or error

    • insertNote

      public void insertNote(String name, int folderId, String text, String subject)
      Inserts a new note under the specified folder
      Parameters:
      name - title of the note
      folderId - ID fo the folder which contains the note
      text - content of the note
      subject - Unused

    • getNoteId

      public int getNoteId(String noteName, int folderId)
      Collects the ID of note by its name and folder
      Parameters:
      noteName - title of the note
      folderId - ID of the folder which contains the notes
      Returns:
      noteId if found or -1 if noteId is not found or error

    • renameNote

      public void renameNote(int noteId, String newName)
      Renames a note by its ID
      Parameters:
      noteId - ID of the note to rename
      newName - new title for the note

    • renameFolder

      public void renameFolder(String oldName, String newName, String userEmail)
      Renames the folder by its old name and owner
      Parameters:
      oldName - the current folder name
      newName - the desired folder name
      userEmail - the user's email identifying the folder's owner

    • updateNoteText

      public void updateNoteText(int noteId, String newText)
      Updates the text content of the existing note.
      Parameters:
      noteId - ID of the note that is need to be updated
      newText - new text content of the note

    • deleteNote

      public void deleteNote(int noteId)
      Deletes a note by the ID
      Parameters:
      noteId - ID of the note that will be deleted

    • deleteFolder

      public void deleteFolder(int folderId)
      Deletes a folder by it's ID
      Parameters:
      folderId - ID of the folder that will be deleted.

    • getAllFolders

      public List<Folder> getAllFolders(String userEmail)
      Retrieves all the folders belonging to the user
      Parameters:
      userEmail - the email which identify the owner
      Returns:
      list of folders for the user

    • getNotesByFolder

      public List<Note> getNotesByFolder(int folderId)
      Retrieves all the notes contained
      Parameters:
      folderId - ID of the folder
      Returns:
      returns the list of Note objects which belong to the folder
